name: Javier Restrepo
comment: i’ve been a member at david lloyd serrano (madrid) for some time now, and i’m honestly very disappointed with how the gym is being managed lately. cleanliness and organization at opening: every single morning when the gym opens, the workout area is not cleaned or organized. plates / discs are scattered, dumbbells are misplaced, and the floor is visibly dirty. this is completely unacceptable — opening time should mean the gym is ready for members, not that we have to train around yesterday’s mess. i’ve raised this issue directly with the manager on several occasions, but all i ever get are standard, templated replies with no actual change or follow-through. it’s a basic expectation for a club of this supposed standard, and yet it’s consistently ignored. removal of key equipment without notice: recently, management decided — without any communication to members — to remove several pieces of essential equipment from the main workout area, including hexagonal dumbbells, kettlebells, and medballs. these items were used daily by many members and were a crucial part of the free-training area. removing them without warning or explanation has negatively affected everyone’s training experience. it shows a complete lack of consideration for the paying members who rely on that equipment. the equipment should be brought back. at this level of membership pricing, one expects professional management, proper maintenance, and transparent communication. unfortunately, none of those standards are being met right now. unless there is a serious change in how this gym is run, i cannot recommend david lloyd serrano to anyone expecting quality, consistency, or accountability.

name: Pasquale Cacciatore
comment: durante una trasferta di lavoro mi sono recato presso questo centro con l'idea di nuotare un poco e di utilizzare la spa. ma solo quando sono arrivato mi è stato comunicato che sia la piscina che la spa erano chiusi per lavori di…

name: Joseph Pearce
comment: impossible to imagine how bad this place became. i was a member for seven years but the recent ‘upgrades’ have made the place unusable. sad to see the level of deterioration. worst part is the management. they make it impossible to leave.

name: lj d
comment: update: they need to be honest with their operating times posted on google maps. they say open up to 10:30 but they start kicking you out 30 mins ahead of closure. it’s ok to close at 10, but don’t mislead! in the last two years i’ve been a member, i’ve seen this place progressively turn into a cesspool with broken equipment, overcrowding and careless staff. i am cancelling my membership today. it’s not worth even a single euro. one star. less, if it were even possible.

name: Neil Briggs
comment: horrendously overpriced gym. you'll find yourself paying nearly €200 a month for the same service as you get at a €25 a month gym. currently all spa facilties and pool are closed for over half a year and should you wish to cancel, you'll be thrown a copy of your contract by the unhelpful and sometimes rude membership support team , informing you that you're locked into a contract and won't be going anywhere. the gym itself is overcrowded at peak times, poorly maintained and the showers and changing room can get disgusting at times, especially the weekend and during lunch/dinner peaks.

name: noelia crespo
comment: terrible management decisions at david lloyd serrano. they sold platinum memberships including crossfit, then removed crossfit without notice and offered no proper replacement. that’s not acceptable — clients feel misled. the gym is also chaotic and disorganized, and staff don’t respond to concerns. it’s no longer worth the price. i’ve left the club after seeing how little they value members.

name: Rustam Khashimkhodjaev
comment: the gym is starting to show it's age. pipes are leaking with no fix for a long time, showers have strange growths on the ceiling and not sufficient weightlifting equipment for the number of users. the club was acquired the number of users increased but no capital investment made. i go because of convince of location but if you have options and you want high end i would recommend to consider other options at least for now. update: no one has reached out at least do what you say you will do. update: more and more equipment busted for weeks with no repair "high end" ..... update: they started with locker renovations, but with each step forward one back, how hard is it to keep deodorant dispenser in the new setup. again, high-end prices for the middle of the range setup. and equipment is in bad shape. new pictures updated.
review_date: Fecha de edición: Hace un año

name: Tanya Fitzgerald
comment: i have been a member of david lloyd at serrano for over a year. javi perez is an amazing trainer. he is prepared, attentive and knows how to get the most out of your session.

name: Tomas Braz Bava
comment: david lloyd serrano has been a disappointing experience and not at all worth the high price. they promise top-tier facilities and a high-end experience, but what you actually get is an overcrowded, overpriced nightmare that traps you in a never-ending subscription scam. overcrowded at all hours – no matter what time you go, the gym is always packed, making it nearly impossible to use machines or find space to work out comfortably. for a gym that charges €150 per month, you’d expect better crowd management, but it feels more like a budget gym during peak hours—except it’s always peak hours here. difficult to cancel membership – be very careful before signing up, because canceling is extremely difficult. they rarely pick up the phone, emails go unanswered, and the process is unnecessarily complicated. many members, including myself, have struggled to stop payments even after following their cancellation procedure. customer service needs improvement – the staff is not particularly helpful and can come across as dismissive when you ask for assistance. for a premium-priced gym, i expected a much better level of service. not worth the cost – the facilities do not justify the price tag. basic-fit, which is one of the most affordable gyms in madrid, offers a similar or even better experience for a fraction of the price. overall, i dont recommend this gym based on my experience. there are better options in madrid that offer more value for money and a smoother customer experience.

name: Andrew Griffin
comment: incredible facility. everything you could want from a gym. sarah in the sales department gave us a great initial tour and explained everything very clearly. highly recommend!

name: Victor Olivo
comment: i can only say the front desk team is the best team ever staring with amor . the whole staff is outstanding and professional , they go the extra mile every single day .

name: Jess
comment: love the club. for pt, highly recommend javi pérez at david lloyd serrano — great energy, expert coaching, and fast results (also a tonne of fun to train with)

name: Carolina Azevedo
comment: this placê just have the name david lloyd. is not in the standart

name: Madrid Eats
comment: i've tried working with multiple personal trainers in madrid and javier perez at david lloyd serano is hands down the best trainer in madrid.

name: D T
comment: we went to the gym to enquire about signing up as we will be in madrid for the next 2 1/2 months. the staff member susana who assisted was extremely professional and polite. she explained the process very clearly and showed us the whole gym with patience and always a smile on the face. the gym was extremely impressive with the gym equipment, pool, restaurant and working area. it’s actually more of a club than a gym. unfortunately we could not sign up as one needs to be a member for a full 3 months. however susana has left such a great impression that we have to leave this review! it’s how relationship personnel should be, regardless of whether the potential clients will sign up in the end.

name: Jody Serrano
comment: i've been a member for four years and i can't imagine going to another club in madrid (i've tried others, regretted it). the quality of the machines is top-notch and it also includes a heated pool, sauna, and ice bath. i also love that it has a restaurant that serves healthy meals every day with different choices. regarding the staff, they're wonderful. i've been training with mario, my personal trainer, for years now and working with him changed my perspective on exercise. he's been especially great to work with because he's taken my injuries into account and always modifies the session if i'm in pain or can't do something. i also can't help but gush about the restaurant staff. they're the type that remember your orders, ask you about what's happening in your life, and create a nice atmosphere to be around. the restaurant and its staff is no doubt that separates this club from others in the city. it's also great as a co-working space, and it's common to see laptops in the lounge. tldr; great club, great equipment, great personal trainers. if you're looking for an amazing and healthy meal, this is where you go.

name: Dave Deleij
comment: "i was really disappointed with my experience at david lloyd serrano. the conditions of the facilities did not meet my expectations—several areas felt poorly maintained, and the cleanliness was inconsistent. additionally, the regulations seemed overly restrictive, limiting flexibility and convenience for members. the policies often felt more focused on enforcing rules than enhancing the member experience. overall, i found it frustrating and not worth the cost. i hope they consider making improvements in both facility upkeep and customer-friendly policies." feel free to adjust this to reflect your specific experience.

name: Conor Sunderland
comment: amazing club to train in, and martina & amor were extremely kind and friendly in helping get me signed up - excited to see them around the place more! the gym is modern and clean with a great atmosphere, and i love the sauna and cold plunge - the only one i've been able to find in the city centre. highly recommend!

name: Zaryn Dentzel
comment: this used to be a great gym. reebok was best gym in madrid. somehow the new owners have managed to slowly destroy everything nice about this place. i’m looking for a new place to change after being a member here for over 15 years. all the original members are leaving or have left.

name: Jensen McPherson
comment: fernanda sold me on the place almost immediately! i was hooked from the moment i arrived! she is an amazing sales person (should be rewarded for it) thank you!

name: Lorenz David Eckhartt
comment: incredibly rude staff. the membership is already expensive enough and hearing comments like "its just 30€ more per month for towels" is an incredibly questionable comment. i've been there for a year and all of a sudden you don't get towels anymore? besides that the spa is dirty and the gym is always completely packed. manage your capacities, i know the renovation was probably expensive but there is no reason to give everything that has a credit card and a pulse a membership. thats not how a good business operates. retain your loyal long-term customers, because it seems like you only care about maximizing your profit. dont go here, you're better off doing push ups at home, cause the machines are always occupied anyways.

name: Oscar Sodian
comment: extremely rude staff as they do not hand you towels unless you pay over 30€ more a month and then they tell you “it’s just 30 euros”. for thirty euros i can go to a better gym. the spa is what i came for and it’s the dirtiest and smelliest place i’ve ever been to. this place is an absolute disaster and ripoff and does not hold european standards. save your money and go somewhere else.

name: Semyon Khanukaev (semiiik)
comment: фитнес-клуб старый, зона свободных весов нуждается в ремонте, как и зона спа ‍ из минусов - нельзя снимать видео, что является странным для такого уровня ( дают полотенце, только если вы приобретаете тариф “platina” раздевалки хорошие, все очень чисто и приятно! душ старый и протекает ( месячный абонемент стоит 179€

name: Leonardo Montesano
comment: no doubt the best wellness club in madrid. from amazing views and clean facilities to fantastic customer service, everyone is very attentive, specially pablo so big thank you! love how bright the environment is so well done for upgrading the facilities!

name: Marcin Misztalski
comment: i definitely do not recommend this gym. i have a one-year contract, it was clearly stated that it would end after one year. now suddenly, when i wrote that i wanted to leave because i changed my place of residence, it turned out that there was a 3-month notice period!!! which was not mentioned at all when concluding the contract! especially for a foreigner who doesn't speak spanish well or doesn't understand it. this is a very clever trick to get money from people. i understand that there may be one month's notice, but 3 months is completely absurd!! and only in special cases it can be shorter, as if i had a accident or what?!... and changing the place of residence is not a sufficient reason?! this is ridiculous! correspondence with this person on this topic is very pathetic and of zero quality, with no attempts at negotiation, only memorized texts. for this much money, a gym should be well-kept, but there are a lot of people there, there is no way to exercise because they accepted too many people just to make money, the equipment is old, neglected, and the pipes are dripping. i do not recommend this place because the money does not translate into quality, and they have terrible leaving conditions!!! don’t let yourself being trapped. they are not worth any cent!

name: ivan stace
comment: the new gym is perfect. very spacious, modern equipment, well lit and impeccably clean. very friendly and helpful staff. well recommended. a great venue to work out.

name: Felix Albert
comment: no towel service - been a member for a long time, but value for money = a bad joke. client support and service unacceptable for the price you pay, and i absolutely don’t recommend joining this gym.

name: Conor Lowe
comment: terrible experience. gym is overcrowded and impossible to do a proper workout. they make it as difficult as possible to leave the contract. decide to close most of the gym for two months with no warning or compensation. 0/10

name: Isaac Karamravan
comment: i can’t believe that i’m paying 219 eur a month and there is a hygiene crisis in the spa of this center and although i’ve already filed a complaint but i didn’t get any response, the entire spa specially the hydrotherapy pool is covered with molds and algae, the water is clearly dirty, the turkish bath (which has nothing to do with an authentic turkish bath and is simply a steam sauna) smells horrible, i got a personal trainers twice and asked her to give me a workout plan as i am a newbie and she didn’t, i finally decided to stop wasting 50 eur for 45 mins!!! and watch youtube videos instead, they just simply don’t care about the health of their clients, putting the public health at risk with their terrible hygiene procedures which seems to be literally nonexistent!!! i’m canceling my membership! i’m also going to report this to the authorities.

name: ines barretto
comment: worst lifestyle / gym place i ever ever been to seriously. renovations foreeever and still looks terrible. gym is now closed and they didn’t increase the amount of classes one bit like they said and the schedule is horrible. they don’t let you end the membership even though they basically scammed you into joining. it’s so bad i’m honestly shocked something like this exists in serrano. biggest regret ever.

name: P Y
comment: i’ve been a member in this club for over 2 years now and today i’m cancelling the membership…the last straw is the recent renovation, the club didn’t inform its members about the possibility of suspension during the renovation period…i heard it from friends working out there while i was traveling in november, i tried to request a refund for the month which i didn’t use and could have requested a suspension…the staffs can’t do anything to compensate the situation nor try to offer something…it’s quite frustrating and unfortunate! i won’t recommend here…

name: Lau MP888
comment: i’m writing this review after several incidents to express my deep dissatisfaction with the experiences my friend and i have had at the david lloyd club in serrano. while the gym's facilities are satisfactory (though old/in need of maintenance), the behaviour of certain staff members and the handling of memberships have been deeply concerning and unprofessional. firstly, my friend and i joined the gym in the summer of 2023, taking advantage of a summer membership discount. despite this, the gym has repeatedly attempted to charge my friend for an annual membership he never signed up for, demanding an outrageous sum of 3000 euros. this ongoing issue has caused significant stress and inconvenience, particularly as my friend, a venezuelan national, feels unfairly targeted. in contrast, i, a spanish national, have had no such issues with my payments. this discrepancy raises questions about the club's integrity and the fairness of its practices. secondly, an incident involving a pilates instructor has left a lasting negative impression. this instructor - ana, unprofessionally threw a tantrum in front of other students when i went to thank her after her class, simply because i unfollowed her on instagram. to add to this, she rescinded her class invitation to me, despite having already completed said class and having previously confirmed my participation in writing. such childish and unprofessional behaviour from a staff member is entirely surprising and unacceptable. additionally, when i went to reception to inform them of this situation and to pay for my pilates class, a staff member (blonde woman), was unnecessarily unpleasant about the whole situation. at least i was not made to pay for the class, tysm, but her attitude is far from what one would expect from a healthcare provider, contributing to an overall toxic environment at the club. while david lloyd club may boast okay-ish facilities, the toxic behaviour from staff and mishandling of memberships are unacceptable. there are plenty of competitors offering better price points, superior facilities, and kinder, more professional staff. i would not recommend david lloyd club to anyone seeking a positive and respectful gym experience and urge you to read the rest of the negative reviews before joining.

name: David Diez
comment: i have been a david lloyd member for 26 years - the bulk of that membership at a number of their fantastic uk facilities. when i moved to madrid for work, i was excited to learn that they had a facility in the centre of the city. however, i can categorically say, as an avid gym goer, that it is one of the worst gyms that i have ever been to - certainly considering how expensive it is. poor, old, unkept equipment, uninterested staff and unacceptably overpriced - the list could go on… this gym is nowhere near the standard of other david lloyd gyms, and its poor management is detrimental to the brand that i have been such a fan of for so many years. i am unfortunately tied into the contract for a whole year, but as soon as it expires i will be going elsewhere. this is the first and only time that i have ever left a review on google, and it was never my intention to do this - i was just going to leave the gym and leave it there. but after i learned today from my wife (who is also a member) that during the summer you pay full price despite there being fewer classes as staff are on holiday, and that you can’t even freeze your membership, i felt the need to speak up. it’s interesting to see a lot of similar reviews from others… i hope that the senior management see this and implement the necessary changes. i know that in the uk that this would not be acceptable. ********************* update (19th august 2024): almost four weeks have passed since my review on google - david lloyd were quick to respond after a few days (see below) saying that they appreciate the feedback, are sorry and that management would reach out directly to sort things out. i am still waiting for management, or anyone for that matter, to reach out. another example of just how little these people care about the brand, and more importantly, their customers. ********************* update (9th october 2024): 7 weeks have passed since my last update (on the 19th august) and i am yet to receive any correspondence - despite them responding on my first post that they would reach out… almost 3 months since said first post. they literally don’t care about their customers - embarrassing and can’t wait to leave when the 12 months is up.
review_date: Fecha de edición: Hace un año

name: Alm-a García
comment: terrible experience: they promise the world to you because they only want you to sign up, then they forget about all the promises. they didn’t give me my “welcome pack” until 6 months later (of course i had to follow up numerous times), and booking my complementary pt session has been impossible. not prepared for people with disabilities either. avoid this club, it is really poorly kept and smells like dirty pipes and hygiene is non-existent (the pool smells like wee and the changing rooms are disgusting. not a nice experience for 175€ per month.

name: Honest Clara
comment: the new owners are doing everything they can to get new clients, so it is not the exclusive gym it was before, but rather it’s becoming a fully packed place with some members clearly not belonging there. i hope the new owners fix many of the basic things basic gyms have: better equipement, not having the class director giving most of the group classes, and hiring more cleaning personnel so the equipment (specially cardio machines) are properly cleaned and ready for the next customer.

name: PAULA ORTI
comment: best gym in madrid! very good instructors in all of the classes, big variety of classes, the place itself is well organized, clean and the stuff are always smiling and ready to help you! its a luxurious gym! the reshape class has been the best thing i discovered, 45min of very intense workout with powerful and dedicated instructors that push you to your limits!

name: riccardo trabattoni
comment: one of the best if not the best gym in the salamanca area in madrid. they charge a premium price but the amount and quality of services offered is unbeatable. the staff is very cordial and knowledgeable as well. there’s of course some problem here and there at times but it’s usually quickly fixed. been going there for a year now, highly recommended.

name: Trey Carter
comment: i lived in madrid for 6 months and joined this gym/club. though expensive, it is an amazing atmosphere. what i enjoyed most as a foreigner was the warmth from the staff working there. all amenities are upscale and adding this to my lifestyle was perfect. if i am able to move back, i will join again. recommend 100%

name: Chitón Losada
comment: management is the worst at this club. they are destroying the david lloyd brand in spain and should be fired immediately. i’m using a pseudonym to avoid retaliation from writing this honest review. i would not recommend coming here.

name: Matt Goodman
comment: run while you still can. this place is a scam - they do not care about customer service and have engineered a business where they neither have a customer service department nor have employees who listen and respond to customer complaints — all while charging you €150+ a month. all complaints are made via email or their app conveniently avoiding human interaction. when you request to speak to management, they refuse. here’s a rundown of this location: the front desk attendant constantly has a horrible attitude and complains to you a whenever you ask for anything from an extra towel to a spare locker key. the classes are constantly always full; almost always scheduled in the 12-15h block; consistently start late; and feature teachers who never seem to enjoy their jobs. locker rooms are basic, not that clean, and offer zero amenities.

name: Parmiss Siahpoush
comment: i have been a member since the previous group “reebok” and i am really grateful that i found this facility! the location of the gym and everything is fantastic. in addition just wanted to send a comment that you should come and try fernando’s master class they are truly amazing, the way how he manages both rooms and yet delivers a great session is truly inspiring and on top super fun! if there is one person who can do this is fernando! hit classes and boxing are my favorite. the only comment i have is now with the take over of david lloyds the women showers in serrano should be updated. i have seen the one in finca they are great. also for platinum member pilates with machine should be allowed too.

name: faraz sharifi
comment: after submitting my previous review my email got responded and iwona ( the lady of the financial department) told me that if i want to talk to the manager i have to visit the club. when arrived at the club i found out that the manager called blanca is not at the gym for 1 week and she is currently in manchester. this is yet another communication error. since 26-10-2023 i am trying to explain the club that i don’t have any outstanding payment and provided them multiple payment receipts and bank statements. to top it all off they told me today that since june 2023 till november 2023 i have not payed a single bill. anyone with a bit of common sense immediately understands that it is impossible for a club member not to pay for 6 months and to be allowed into the gym for all those 6 months and only to find out after 6 months that you have not paid. finally, i receive an email from the debt collector that i have to pay an amount of €1712. after going through this and communicating with the club, they came to the conclusion that it is "wrong again". in summary, my experience at david lloyd has been marred by a series of errors, miscommunications, and an unnecessary ordeal concerning outstanding payments. i kindly request that you address these issues promptly and provide a resolution to this matter.

name: Nir Ailon
comment: i really loved reebok/david lloyd last year. but under the new management and brand they have steadily degraded the service and increased the price to the extent that it is now priced as an exclusive club, but without any justification, in comparison with other alternatives in town and in the neighborhood. hence, i switched to an alternative. check the alternatives before signing up or renewing, you might save money and get better value.

name: faraz sharifi
comment: i would not recommend this club, it is a scam don't trust them. i have payed my my membership for 6months and they keep saying that i have pending payments. it is not €150,00 worth at all !! it is disgusting, the receptionist are also verry rude absolutist not a recommendation

name: Gonzalo Tudela
comment: quality place with good, honest staff. facilities maintenance isn’t the greatest but the machines are tip top . sauna is hot and cold tub brings a new meaning to “cool down”. recommended for those looking for an all-in-one place with high standards

name: Maria de Esteban Belzuz
comment: super friendly staff, great sports facilities! so far the best gym i have tried in madrid

name: Daniel Alejandro
comment: best club in madrid. the best attention received and with very good facilities. highly recommended, it has been a good experience!

name: D
comment: the 2nd stepper didn’t work for 2 weeks! actually it’s not working for a 1 year, the 2 nd hip machine not working also 2 weeks! sorry, u are an expensive gym, why u can’t fix this? 1 stepper it’s not enough for so much people..i liked the gym , but now all this make me sad , also people don’t remove the weight after themselves!( even man) sorry! u have to respect other people doing excersises after u! why i should move 20 kg ur weight ?!

name: Konstantin Lachenauer
comment: great gym! many machines to avoid waiting times. single entries and memberships available. clean and spacious.

name: HealMe ByHamla
comment: great gym in the center of madrid. easily accessible by public transportation. they have got programs for all the ages.

name: Ivan Grgic
comment: vrlo kvalitetna teretana. veliki izbor aktivnosti, strojevi u dobrom stanju i odlično osoblje. uvijek čisto, ručnika ne nedostaje, a čak i ako je velika gužva nema osjećaja pretrpanosti. ako se dvoumite u koju teretanu ići na ovom području preporučujem ti je.

name: F G
comment: teretana me oduševila svojom ljubaznošću i pažnjom prema korisnicima. osoblje je uvijek tu da ponudi potrebne savjete i pruži motivaciju za svaku vježbu. osim toga, opremljena je najnovijom tehnologijom koja prati moj napredak.

name: David Ohandjanian
comment: great gym and we'll equipped with a beautiful view

name: fernando lebrija
comment: best gym in town. pool, crossfit, yoga, etc. very clean.

name: sameroon
comment: great spacious gym with friendly employees and amazing view! 10/10

name: Nico
comment: not worth the high fee. they have been refurbishing for months without offering even a discount

name: Tamara Jakšić
comment: prekrasna teretana na krovu sa brutalnim pogledom na pola grada, jako nam se svidala teretana i sam objekat, jednostavan ulaz i ciste i lijepe prostorije

name: Val
comment: horrendous customer service and membership policies. avoid this gym at all costs and their abusive practices.

name: Luka Resetar
comment: odlicam boksacki trening odraden. sve bilo super. trenee fantastican i vracam se opet dok cu biti ovdje

name: Maja Hadžić
comment: fantasticna teretana, box uz trenera je odlican nacin za trening. definitivno preporucavam …

name: Neyla Benkadda
comment: i have tried a lot of different gyms in madrid and ithis is the best gym in madrid.

name: Victoria Ducournau
comment: on of the best place for workout, wellness and having fun in madrid. highly recommended!

name: M Plus
comment: the registration process on the website is impossible, ive lost like 1hour trying to create an account, login etc. its one of the worse online experience for a long time, tried multiples browsers etc, fix your website

name: Nicolas Burneo
comment: best gym

name: Marco S. Giarratana
comment: very nice and professional reception ale & amor super and always with a smile

name: David Domínguez Rodríguez
comment: amazing space! great equipment and friendly staff!

name: Elena Krause
comment: excellent attention from sarah !

name: Victoire Duhamel
comment: au plein centre de madrid, un club complet et bien agencé! il y a tout pour s'y plaire

name: EgonM
comment: big and well organised place, i like to come here

name: Theo Roussel
comment: bad customer service, cancelling a subscription is worse than going through a divorce

name: Samuel McLernon
comment: not sure it's worth the price

name: juan felipe andrade ospina
comment: sarah

name: Guillaume Ledain
comment: endroit très propre et très professionnel

name: José M. Perez Cidoncha
comment: the best

name: Timothee A GIRAUD
comment: needs to be repaired urgently!

name: Gustavo Hernandez
comment: facilities are old. expensive for what it is

name: Abigail
comment: disappointed

name: Felix Eckhartt
comment: very unfriendly!

name: Michael Krause
comment: super sarah

name: Daniel Ruet
comment: très beau cadre …

name: Abdellatif Bousakkine
comment: good service

name: Ange Emmanuella Audrina INEZA
comment: hyper cool

name: ERASMO MAGALLANES
comment: totally
